public class TypeCasting { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int a =112; long b =a; float c=a; double d=a; System.out.println("Implicit Conversion"); System.out.println("int value " +a); System.out.println("long value "+b); System.out.println("float Value "+c); System.out.println("Double Vaule " +d); System.out.println(" "); System.out.println("Explicit Conversion"); double f = 144.12; long g = (long)f; int i= (int)g; System.out.println("int value "+i); System.out.println("long value "+g); } }
